overview:
Thomas Bindl founded Refined Labs in early 2007 to develop a next-generation online marketing toolbox with a focus on cross-channel and cross-campaign optimization as well as leading SEM bid management. The focus is on corporate PPC spenders, affiliates as well as agencies across Europe.

Before founding Refined Labs, Thomas did Online Marketing consulting for big firms in Europe and the US with a focus on SEO for big websites. He worked in areas such as Travel, retail finance or education and has a proven track record as a consultant since 2003.

He’s a well known speaker at Industry conferences such as Search Marketing Expo, Search Engine Strategies or WebmasterWorld PubCon across the globe.
